entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023
